text: the sons of Reaiah. Jairus, the sons of Rezin. Daisan, the sons of Nekoda. Noeba, the sons of Chaseba, the sons of Gazzam. Gazera, the sons of Uzza. Ozias, the sons of Paseah. Phinoe, the sons of Asara, the sons of Besai. Basthai, the sons of Asnah. Asana, the sons of Meunim. Maani, the sons of Nephisim. Naphisi, the sons of Bakbuk. According to other readings, Acum, or Acuph. Acub, the sons of Hakupha. Achipha, the sons of Harhur. Asur, the sons of Pharakim, the sons of Bazluth. Basaloth,
